docs.text: Saturn and Rings Quote from Wiki: The rings of Saturn are the most extensive ring system of any planet in the Solar System. They consist of countless small particles, ranging in size from micrometers to meters, that orbit about Saturn. Control & Optimization (P2) Interesting Projects Python script for basic poisson network https://hpaulkeeler.com/category/stochastic-geometry/ ML for wireless comm https://github.com/IIT-Lab/Paper-with-Code-of-Wireless-communication-Based-on-DL UAV, Robotic Network, Sto-Geometry Other Links sto-geo researcher: Blaszczyszyn Link: https://www.di.ens.fr/~blaszczy/ non-convex optimization but solvable/provable https://sunju.org/research/nonconvex/ Math Notations https://arxiv.org/pdf/1904.10307.pdf Idea Topics: Backup Multicast/unicast optimization in single cell UAV Jamming? detect a group of UAVs that try to jam the channel act as a group to jam the whole channel Maximize tput under a given power budget Given an average power budget P_avg: If we can scale BW for capacity and power trade-off User can communicate with NW about scaled BW For a slot, NW can be in Idle, or Active If Active, NW scheduling ratio can be random variable Meanwhile, channel gain and noise (thus SNR) is also random variable how to optimize?

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Category:Theorems_in_statistics Proof of Chebyshey and Law of Large Number Link: https://www.dartmouth.edu/~chance/teaching_aids/books_articles/probability_book/Chapter8.pdf Proof of PGD for convex function inner product properties Link: Analysis https://mathcs.org/analysis/reals/index.html Chain rule of differentiation http://faculty.wlc.edu/buelow/calc/nt3-5.html Implicit Function Theorem https://arxiv.org/pdf/1607.01668.pdf Function Approximation GREEDY FUNCTION APPROXIMATION: A GRADIENT BOOSTING MACHINE1 https://projecteuclid.org/download/pdf_1/euclid.aos/1013203451 Wirtinger derivatives for Complex Variables https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wirtinger_derivatives https://arxiv.org/pdf/1005.5170.pdf I. Achieser, Theory of Approximation. Dover Publications, Inc., New York, 1992. Non-Convex Optimization A unified algorithmic framework for block-structured optimization involving big data: With applications in machine learning and signal processing This algorithm covers a set of iterative optimization ideas, where only one variable is updated in each iteration while the rest variables keep unchanged. Non-Convex Optimization in Machine Learning https://arxiv.org/abs/1712.07897 nice maths symbols projected GD method (Chapter II) sec 3.3: gPGD Tractable Non-convex Problem with Symmetry https://arxiv.org/pdf/2007.06753.pdf phase, or dictionary transform

docs.text: Academic Important Papers Paper Reading Notes Dual Mirror Descent for Online Allocation Problems not finished yet https://proceedings.icml.cc/static/paper_files/icml/2020/2866-Paper.pdf Optimal Policies for Observing Time Series and Related Restless Bandit Problems Solving a perturbed amplitude-based model for phase retrieval https://arxiv.org/pdf/1904.10307.pdf Proof requires a lot of maths Best Arm Identification for Contaminated Bandits https://jmlr.csail.mit.edu/papers/volume20/18-395/18-395.pdf Action-Manipulation Attacks Against Stochastic Bandits: Attacks and Defense https://arxiv.org/pdf/2002.08000.pdf On the Adaptivity of Stochastic Gradient-Based Optimization https://arxiv.org/pdf/1904.04480.pdf Ensemble Kalman methods for high-dimensional hierarchical dynamic space-time models https://arxiv.org/pdf/1704.06988.pdf GLOBAL OPTIMIZATION WITH POLYNOMIALS AND THE PROBLEM OF MOMENTS http://web.mit.edu/~a_a_a/Public/Publications/refs_for_seb_blog/Lasserre.pdf Joint Design of Comm and Radar https://arxiv.org/pdf/1711.05220.pdf Use OFDM signal for target detection: range, velocity, and angle https://www.hindawi.com/journals/wcmc/2018/2708416/ Handover skipping? https://arxiv.org/pdf/2008.10535.pdf Mixed Monotonic Programming for Fast Global Optimization https://arxiv.org/pdf/1910.07853.pdf Multi-UAV Interference Coordination via Joint Trajectory and Power Control optimization problem solved by optimizing lower bound also solved by ADMM? also solved by nonlinear optimization PHD thesis for PCA https://hal.archives-ouvertes.fr/tel-01388978/document Best Pair Formulation & Accelerated Scheme for Non-convex Principal Component Pursuit https://arxiv.org/pdf/1905.10598.pdf [TSP] Subspace clustering without knowing the number of clusters: A parameter free approach https://arxiv.org/pdf/1909.04406.pdf [TSP] Inverse Filtering for Hidden Markov Models with Applications to Counter-Adversarial Autonomous Systems https://arxiv.org/pdf/2001.11809.pdf [TIT] Nonconvex Rectangular Matrix Completion via Gradient Descent without l2,∞ Regularization https://arxiv.org/pdf/1901.06116.pdf [T Control] Distributed Interpolation Schemes for Field Estimation by Mobile Sensor Networks https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/stamp/stamp.jsp?arnumber=5229132&casa_token=rgZncmJxPh4AAAAA:WcICWDLw28cZL6KJF6-aTn63g4TyghVWUdmXCNEd2J7GJqwMiRhmQ4TykcOJrz_Zd-DrFFiVKA&tag=1 A ROBUST MACHINE LEARNING METHOD FOR CELL-LOAD APPROXIMATION IN WIRELESS NETWORKS Very interesting a paper, there are three items learned from this paper: how to prove a set is compact how to prove a function is uniformly continuous how to approximate with min-max from dataset Trajectory Poisson multi-Bernoulli filters per my understanding, this paper is trying to estimate the number of alive or total trajectories from distribution PoV. It is a paper in stats domain. Decentralized Accelerated Gradient Methods With Increasing Penalty Parameters Link: https://arxiv.org/pdf/1810.01053.pdf Tensor Completion from Regular Sub-Nyquist Samples Link: https://arxiv.org/pdf/1903.00435.pdf Two-Step Codeword Design for Millimeter Wave Massive MIMO Systems with Quantized Phase Shifters Link: https://arxiv.org/pdf/2002.06351.pdf ideal codebook, discrete phase search, practical beam Convergence of a Multi-Agent Projected Stochastic Gradient Algorithm for Non-Convex Optimization link: https://arxiv.org/pdf/1107.2526.pdf doubly stochastic weight matrix Kronecker product https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kronecker_product almost surely convergence: https://www.probabilitycourse.com/chapter7/7_2_7_almost_sure_convergence.php http://www.stat.cmu.edu/~larry/=stat705/Lecture4.pdf [08/23/2020] NEXT: In-Network Nonconvex Optimization https://arxiv.org/pdf/1602.00591.pdf classical gradient-consensus algorithms Bayesian Methods for Multiple Change-Point Detection with Reduced Communication https://arxiv.org/pdf/2003.11062.pdf sigma-algebras : http://theanalysisofdata.com/probability/E_1.html [TSP] [08/23/2020] Soft Range Information for Network Localization Paper from MIT Win's team focus is accuracy info/distribution for network localization [TSP] [08/22/2020] Signal-Dependent Performance Analysis of Orthogonal Matching Pursuit for Exact Sparse Recovery https://arxiv.org/pdf/2008.05071.pdf analyzed the property of Orthogonal Matching Pursuit for a sparse recovery problem [TSP] [08/22/2020] Sparse Array Design via Fractal Geometries https://arxiv.org/pdf/2001.01217.pdf a nice example about induction proof: Base, Assumption step k, Step k+1 proof about fraction is not very clear to me Linear Multiple Low-Rank Kernel Based Stationary Gaussian Processes Regression for Time Series predicting wireless data pattern https://gitxuy.github.io/files/GlobeCom17_GP.pdf Stochastic Geometric Millimeter Wave Outdoor Cellular Networks: Stochastic Geometry Channel Modeling and Performance Analysis Study Note: Unified Stochastic Geometry Modeling and Analysis of Cellular Networks in LOS/NLOS and Shadowed Fading Note: theoretical analysis framework for BER modeling The Intensity Matching Approach: A Tractable Stochastic Geometry Approximation to System-Level Analysis of Cellular Networks Note: can use the framework modeling in this paper for a cellular mmW study Analytical Model for Outdoor Millimeter Wave Channels Using Geometry-Based Stochastic Approach Note: [TO Read] The impact of mobility model on handover rate in heterogeneous multi-tier wireless networks [TO Read] Recent progress in Sto-Geo in cellular https://chiranjibsaha.github.io/files/Saha_C_D_2020.pdf General [On-Going] Modeling and Analysis of Cellular Networks Using Stochastic Geometry: A Tutorial Reading Note: study is on-going, has not finished. It presents some basic theorems in this topic. https://arxiv.org/pdf/1812.07665.pdf Link: https://arxiv.org/pdf/1812.07665.pdf Universal Best Arm Identification Song Shen's paper Błaszczyszyn, B. and Keeler, H. P. (2015). Studying the SINR process of the typical user in Poisson networks by using its factorial moment measures. IEEE Trans. Inf. Theory 61, 6774 - 6794. Reading Note: distribution characterization for SNR, SINR, and STINR FR2 over 52GHz Large Scale LoRa Network https://arxiv.org/pdf/2008.07438.pdf Age of Information https://arxiv.org/pdf/2008.07717.pdf Robotic Wireless Network ON-GOING Joint trajectory and communication design for multi-UAV enabled wireless networks Note: fundamental flagship paper in this area Link: https://web.ece.ucsb.edu/mostofi-lab/overview/CommRobotics.html also good nice page template? Paper: https://arxiv.org/pdf/1308.0037.pdf TO READ * [TO READ] Online Trajectory Optimization Using Inexact Gradient Feedback for Time-Varying Environments [To Read] Connecting flying backhauls of drones to enhance vehicular networks with fixed 5G NR infrastructure [To Read] Autonomous UAV-aided Mesh Wireless Networks [To Read] Distributed Intelligence Empowered Data Aggregation and Distribution for Multi-robot Cooperative Communication [To Read] QoS_Compliant_3D_Deployment_Optimization_Strategy_UAV_BS [To Read] Intelligent UAV Based Flexible 5G Emergency Networks: Field Trial and System Level Results [To Read] Deep_QNetwork_Dynamic_Movement_Strategy_UAV_Assisted_Network [To Read] Distributed Deep Learning-based Task Offloading for UAV-enabled Mobile Edge Computing [To Read] UAV_Communications_5G_and_Beyond_Recent_Advances_Future_Trends [To Read] Latency and Reliability Oriented Collaborative Optimization for Multi-UAV Aided Mobile Edge Computing System

also solved by nonlinear optimization PHD thesis for PCA https://hal.archives-ouvertes.fr/tel-01388978/document Best Pair Formulation & Accelerated Scheme for Non-convex Principal Component Pursuit https://arxiv.org/pdf/1905.10598.pdf [TSP] Subspace clustering without knowing the number of clusters: A parameter free approach https://arxiv.org/pdf/1909.04406.pdf [TSP] Inverse Filtering for Hidden Markov Models with Applications to Counter-Adversarial Autonomous Systems https://arxiv.org/pdf/2001.11809.pdf [TIT] Nonconvex Rectangular Matrix Completion via Gradient Descent without l2,∞ Regularization https://arxiv.org/pdf/1901.06116.pdf [T Control] Distributed Interpolation Schemes for Field Estimation by Mobile Sensor Networks https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/stamp/stamp.jsp?arnumber=5229132&casa_token=rgZncmJxPh4AAAAA:WcICWDLw28cZL6KJF6-aTn63g4TyghVWUdmXCNEd2J7GJqwMiRhmQ4TykcOJrz_Zd-DrFFiVKA&tag=1 A ROBUST MACHINE LEARNING METHOD FOR CELL-LOAD APPROXIMATION IN WIRELESS NETWORKS Very interesting a paper, there are three items learned from this paper: how to prove a set is compact how to prove a function is uniformly continuous how to approximate with min-max from dataset Trajectory Poisson multi-Bernoulli filters per my understanding, this paper is trying to estimate the number of alive or total trajectories from distribution PoV. It is a paper in stats domain. Decentralized Accelerated Gradient Methods With Increasing Penalty Parameters Link: https://arxiv.org/pdf/1810.01053.pdf Tensor Completion from Regular Sub-Nyquist Samples Link: https://arxiv.org/pdf/1903.00435.pdf Two-Step Codeword Design for Millimeter Wave Massive MIMO Systems with Quantized Phase Shifters Link: https://arxiv.org/pdf/2002.06351.pdf ideal codebook, discrete phase search, practical beam Convergence of a Multi-Agent Projected Stochastic Gradient Algorithm for Non-Convex Optimization link: https://arxiv.org/pdf/1107.2526.pdf doubly stochastic weight matrix Kronecker product https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kronecker_product almost surely convergence: https://www.probabilitycourse.com/chapter7/7_2_7_almost_sure_convergence.php http://www.stat.cmu.edu/~larry/=stat705/Lecture4.pdf [08/23/2020] NEXT: In-Network Nonconvex Optimization https://arxiv.org/pdf/1602.00591.pdf classical gradient-consensus algorithms Bayesian Methods for Multiple Change-Point Detection with Reduced Communication https://arxiv.org/pdf/2003.11062.pdf sigma-algebras : http://theanalysisofdata.com/probability/E_1.html [TSP] [08/23/2020] Soft Range Information for Network Localization Paper from MIT Win's team focus is accuracy info/distribution for network localization [TSP] [08/22/2020] Signal-Dependent Performance Analysis of Orthogonal Matching Pursuit for Exact Sparse Recovery https://arxiv.org/pdf/2008.05071.pdf analyzed the property of Orthogonal Matching Pursuit for a sparse recovery problem [TSP] [08/22/2020] Sparse Array Design via Fractal Geometries https://arxiv.org/pdf/2001.01217.pdf a nice example about induction proof: Base, Assumption step k, Step k+1 proof about fraction is not very clear to me Linear Multiple Low-Rank Kernel Based Stationary Gaussian Processes Regression for Time Series predicting wireless data pattern https://gitxuy.github.io/files/GlobeCom17_GP.pdf
